[Managing Clan Hall]
Name Curtain (a decoration)
Cost%funcCost%
Function An item to decorate Clan Hall.

The fee to use this facility item is payment in advance.
The first usage fee will be drafted from the inventory of the Clan Leader, and the next usage fee thereafter will be automatically withdrawn from the clan warehouse.
If there is not a sufficient Adena fund in the clan warehouse, the facility will return to the initial condition.
